titles.title: A resolution commending Clifford Hugh Frame for his leadership and achievement in the operation of the Cyprus Anvil Mine.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 6/9/1988--Introduced. Commends Clifford Hugh Frame for his leadership and achievement in the operation of the Cyprus Anvil Mine, Canada.
